name: BuzzKiller
description:
As you're enjoying an amazing night of fun, a killer sneaks into an otherwise great party, and he seems to be determined to chase you and a fellow partygoer down until either one of you is dead. Be the sole survivor as you flee from the killer and try to trap the other target. 

-------------------

Buzzkiller is a top down action, infiltration and strategy game. Trapped in a club while the light is dying out, work with the other player to keep the light lit, as you're trying to survive on your own. Close doors in the face of the other prey and trigger alarms in order to manipulate the killer into murdering the other player.
